Class CartDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.dao.impl.CartDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CartDao, Dao<java.lang.Long,Cart>

    public class CartDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CartDao
    The Cart dao class provides manipulation of Cart entity with database.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
